alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 13 at 1:59PM CDT until May 13 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Scott County in west central Illinois... Central Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Winchester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Murrayville around 215 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Woodson and Jacksonville. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 54 and 67. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
